snippet: Books with New York City themes feature Hetty Green, the Wall Street miser; Ralph Walker, the architect; synagogues, trees; and Grand Central Terminal.
abstract: Sam Roberts reviews books The Richest Woman in America by Janet Wallach, Ralph Walker: Architect of the Century by Kathryn E Holliday, The Synagogues of New York's Lower East Side by Gerard R Wolfe, Grand Central: Gateway to a Million Lives and Magnificent Trees of the New York Botanical Garden by Larry Lederman and Todd A Forrest.
lead_paragraph: Books with New York City themes feature Hetty Green, the Wall Street miser; Ralph Walker, the architect; synagogues, trees; and Grand Central Terminal.

headline.seo: Books on Hetty Green, a Miser, and Ralph Walker, an Architect
